events.message: I received the wrong size of the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to customer mentioning a size issue and desire for money back or exchange.
A customer service agent specializing in returns and refunds has been assigned to handle this case.
